hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the path to #Volvagia#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #frozen cavern# echoes with #a Blue Rupee#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Zora Tunic#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #Cojiro# and #a Recovery Heart#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path to #Barinade#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# hoards #the Iron Boots#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that plundering #Hyrule Castle# is a foolish choice.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo's Fortress# is a foolish choice.

HC (Malon).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Map of the Shadow Temple#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Domain# is a foolish choice.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #the Megaton Hammer#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Eyeball Frog#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple Boss Key# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: Did you know that ReDead mourn their defeated friends?

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #a Piece of Heart# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that Sheik dispelled the barrier around #Ganon's Tower#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #the Boomerang# and #a Wallet#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #storm within Zora's Domain# reveals an #Octorok# guarding a rich pool.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the path to #Morpha#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Zora Tunic#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Eyeball Frog#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #a Huge Rupee#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that a #diving experiment# is rewarded with #an Ocarina#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #a Magic Meter# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that ##the Thieves' Hideout## has #0# major items.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Map of the Shadow Temple#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the way of the hero.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

ZF (Fairy).text: Did you know that you can Boomerang items that are freestanding Heart Pieces in the unrandomized game?

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that ##inside Ganon's Castle## has #2# major items.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that a #pool of lava# in Goron City blocks the way to a pool guarded by a #Tektite#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #the Desert Colossus# is on the way of the hero.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Dead Hand in the well# guards...^ #a Map of Dodongo's Cavern# and #a Forest Temple Compass#.
